name: Miami Nights: Singles in the City
description: Miami Nights: Singles in the City for the Nintendo DS is a remake of the mobile game with the same name. Unlike the isometric 2D graphics of the original game, this version has completely remade three dimensional graphics. The basic gameplay is the same but some new mini games that utilizes the system's touch screen has been added. These involves various jobs that need to be done to earn money including washing dishes and waiting tables.
